name: 陳奕宏
objective:
介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
The course introduces the material and energy balances of the chemical process. Students learn to define the system, practice the conservation law of mass and energy, and look up handbook for necessary information.

1　　課程簡介

2　　Ch1 Dimensions, Units, And Their Conversion
         Ch2 Moles, Density, And Concentration
3　　Ch2 Moles, Density, And Concentration

         Ch5 Pressure
5　　Ch6 Introduction To Material Balances
6　　Ch7 A General Strategy For Solving Material Balance Problems
7　　Ch8 Solving Material Balance Problems For Single Units Without Reaction
8　　Ch8 Solving Material Balance Problems For Single Units Without Reaction
9　　期中考試
10　　Ch9 The Chemical Reaction Equation And Stoichiometry
11　　Ch9 The Chemical Reaction Equation And Stoichiometry
         Ch10 Material Balances For Processes Involving Reaction
12　　Ch21 Energy: Terminology, Concepts, And Units

14　　Ch23 Calculation Of Enthalpy Changes

scorePolicy:
1.成績計算：小考及作業25%，期中考 25%，期末考 30%，平時成績 20%。
2.注意事項：上課需專心，禁止講話與其他影響他人上課之行為。上課點名，若有不克出席的情況，請上課之前請假，缺課過多將列入總成績評比參考。考試嚴禁作弊，違者嚴辦。
materials:
1.教材書目：Himmelblau, D.M. and J.B. Riggs, Basic Principles and Calculations in Chemical Engineering, 7th, U.S.A, Prentice Hall PTR, 2004 (書號：ISBN 0-13-123368-8) 
2.參考書目：Felder, R.M. and R.W. Rousseau, Elementary Principles Of Chemical Processes, 3rd, U.S.A, John Wiley & Sons, 2000 (書號：ISBN 0-471-53478-1)
